title: Registration Opens
description: Start of registration period for all participants. Early bird rates available until February 28th.

title: Early Bird Registration Ends
description: Deadline to benefit from reduced registration fees. Regular rates apply after this date.

title: Preliminary Program Release
description: Publication of the detailed program with confirmed plenary sessions, workshops, and presentations.

title: Registration Closes
description: Final deadline to register for the conference. No registrations will be accepted after this date.

title: CIRIV 2025 Conference
description: Three days dedicated to One Health discussions, featuring international experts, thematic sessions, and practical workshops.

title: Proceedings Publication
description: Online publication of presentations and conference synthesis documents for all participants.
